attributes.action: Anyone in possession of a knife will recieved a mandatory 10 year sentence
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime devastates the lives of victims and their families and brings misery and fear to our communities. We need to work together to ensure that everyone understands that carrying a knife can easily end in tragedy.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make a law change to ensure anyone guilty of illegal possession of a knife will recieve a mandatory 10 year prison sentence.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636853
